it.essepuntato.earmark.core.io
Interface EARMARKIOLogger

All Known Subinterfaces:
EARMARKReader, EARMARKWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
EARMARKBaseLogger, JenaReader, JenaWriter
public interface EARMARKIOLogger

An interface for recording issues and messages from input/output classes and methods.

Author:
Silvio Peroni
